name: Hot Day At The Beach
description:
Made in less than 24 hours for Mana Burst I - TIMED!

Hot Day At The Beach
Philip is out having a relaxing day on the beach when he notices a fire off in the distance headed towards him. With nothing but his empty glass of pink lemonade in his hand Philip springs into action to save the day.

Will he be able to save the beach?
(P.S. Watch out for that hungry duck)

Controls:
W, A, S, D   - Move
Left Shift   - Run
Left Click   - Pick up water and douse fire
R                     - Restart
ESC               - Exit game

Gameplay:
Pick up water from the ocean and douse the fires headed your way
Fires have 3 different sizes depending on how much water is needed to stop them larger fire means more water (1-3)
Philip can hold up to 3 clicks of water in his glass at a time

(Caution: Using your water will empty your entire cup)
